Enumeration.label: FROM_CDS
Enumeration.shortDescription: Used for reset processing, not valid state

Entry.shortDescription: New LC application state

Enumeration.shortDescription: Actionpoint unused, not valid command argument

Entry.shortDescription: Which actionpoint(s) to change

Entry.shortDescription: New actionpoint state

Entry.shortDescription: Which actionpoint(s) to change

Entry.shortDescription: Which actionpoint(s) to change

Entry.name: WPNumber
Entry.shortDescription: Which watchpoint(s) to change

Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: StartIndex
Entry.shortDescription: Start actionpoint to sample

Entry.name: EndIndex
Entry.shortDescription: End actionpoint to sample

Entry.name: UpdateAge
Entry.shortDescription: Update WP results age (T or F)

Entry.name: Padding
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

ContainerDataType.name: RtsRequest_CmdPayload
ContainerDataType.shortDescription: Payload to Start a Stored Command RTS

Entry.name: RTSId
Entry.shortDescription: RTS Id to start

Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

ContainerDataType.name: RtsRequest
ContainerDataType.shortDescription: Send Command to Start a Stored Command RTS

Enumeration.label: FALSE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKWR_FALSE

Enumeration.label: TRUE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKWR_TRUE

Enumeration.label: ERROR
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKWR_ERROR

Enumeration.label: STALE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKWR_STALE

Enumeration.label: PASS
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_PASS

Enumeration.label: FAIL
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_FAIL

Enumeration.label: ERROR
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_ERROR

Enumeration.label: STALE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_STALE

EnumeratedDataType.name: ApResState
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Housekeeping Packed Action Results, State Identifiers

Enumeration.label: NOT_USED
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_STATE_NOT_USED

Enumeration.label: ACTIVE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_STATE_ACTIVE

Enumeration.label: PASSIVE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_STATE_PASSIVE

Enumeration.label: DISABLED
Enumeration.shortDescription: Two bit value used for LC_HKAR_STATE_DISABLED

Entry.name: CmdCount
Entry.shortDescription: LC Application Command Counter

Entry.name: CmdErrCount
Entry.shortDescription: LC Application Command Error Counter

Entry.name: CurrentLCState
Entry.shortDescription: Current LC application operating state

Entry.name: Pad8
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: WPResults
Entry.shortDescription: Packed watchpoint results data, 2 bits per watchpoint

Entry.name: APResults
Entry.shortDescription: Packed actionpoint results data, 2 bits per actionpoint

Entry.name: PassiveRTSExecCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total count of RTS sequences not initiated because the LC state is set to #LC_STATE_PASSIVE or the state of the actionpoint that failed is set to #LC_APSTATE_PASSIVE

Entry.name: WPsInUse
Entry.shortDescription: How many watchpoints are currently in effect

Entry.name: ActiveAPs
Entry.shortDescription: How many actionpoints are currently active

Entry.name: Pad16
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: APSampleCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total count of Actionpoints sampled

Entry.name: MonitoredMsgCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total count of messages monitored for watchpoints

Entry.name: RTSExecCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total count of RTS sequences initiated

Entry.name: DefaultState
Entry.shortDescription: Default state for this AP

Entry.name: MaxPassiveEvents
Entry.shortDescription: Max number of events before RTS not started because AP is passive

Entry.name: MaxPassFailEvents
Entry.shortDescription: Max number of events before AP result transition from pass to fail

Entry.name: MaxFailPassEvents
Entry.shortDescription: Max number of events before AP result transition from fail to pass

Entry.name: RTSId
Entry.shortDescription: RTS to request if this AP fails

Entry.name: MaxFailsBeforeRTS
Entry.shortDescription: How may consecutive failures before an RTS request is issued

Entry.name: RPNEquation
Entry.shortDescription: Reverse Polish Equation that specifies when this actionpoint should fail

Entry.name: EventType
Entry.shortDescription: Event type used for event msg if AP fails

Entry.name: EventID
Entry.shortDescription: Event ID used for event msg if AP fails

Entry.name: EventText
Entry.shortDescription: Text used for the event msg when this AP fails

ContainerDataType.name: MultiType
ContainerDataType.shortDescription: Store the watch data points, as they may be 8, 16, or 32 bits and this is defined in the table / not known until runtime

EnumeratedDataType.name: WdtDataType
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Watchpoint Definition Table (WDT) DataType Enumerated Types

Enumeration.label: WORD_BE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed word big endian byte order

Enumeration.label: WORD_LE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed word little endian byte order

Enumeration.label: UWORD_BE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit unsigned word big endian byte order

Enumeration.label: UWORD_LE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit unsigned word little endian byte order

Enumeration.label: DWORD_BE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed double word big endian byte order

Enumeration.label: DWORD_LE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed double word little endian byte order

Enumeration.label: UDWORD_BE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed unsigned double word big endian byte order

Enumeration.label: UDWORD_LE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 16 bit signed unsigned double word little endian byte order

Enumeration.label: FLOAT_BE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 32 bit single precision IEEE-754 floating point number, big endian byte order

Enumeration.label: FLOAT_LE
Enumeration.shortDescription: 32 bit single precision IEEE-754 floating point number, little endian byte order

EnumeratedDataType.name: WdtOperatorID
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Watchpoint Definition Table (WDT) DataType Enumerated Types

Entry.name: DataType
Entry.shortDescription: Watchpoint Data Type (enumerated)

Entry.name: OperatorID
Entry.shortDescription: Comparison type (enumerated)

Entry.name: MessageID
Entry.shortDescription: Message ID for the message containing the watchpoint

Entry.name: WatchpointOffset
Entry.shortDescription: Byte offset from the beginning of the message (including any headers) to the watchpoint

Entry.name: BitMask
Entry.shortDescription: Value to be masked with watchpoint data prior to comparison

Entry.name: ComparisonValue
Entry.shortDescription: Value watchpoint data is compared against

Entry.name: ResultAgeWhenStale
Entry.shortDescription: Number of LC Sample Actionpoint commands that must be processed after comparison before result goes stale

Entry.name: CustomFuncArgument
Entry.shortDescription: Data passed to the custom function when Operator_ID is set to #LC_OPER_CUSTOM

Entry.name: Value
Entry.shortDescription: Watchpoint value at comparison that caused the transition

Entry.name: DataType
Entry.shortDescription: Same as Watchpoint Data Type (enumerated)

Entry.name: Padding
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: Timestamp
Entry.shortDescription: Timstamp when the transition was detected

EnumeratedDataType.name: WrtWatchResult
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Watchpoint Results Table (WRT) WatchResult Enumerated Types

Enumeration.label: FALSE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Watchpoint false, must be zero for RPN evaluation

Enumeration.label: TRUE
Enumeration.shortDescription: Watchpoint true, must be one for RPN evaluation

Entry.name: WatchResult
Entry.shortDescription: Result for the last evaluation of this watchpoint (enumerated)

Entry.name: Padding
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: CountdownToStale
Entry.shortDescription: Number of LC Sample Actionpoint commands still to be processed before WatchResult becomes stale

Entry.name: EvaluationCount
Entry.shortDescription: How many times this watchpoint has been evaluated

Entry.name: FalseToTrueCount
Entry.shortDescription: How many times this watchpoint has transitioned from FALSE to TRUE

Entry.name: ConsecutiveTrueCount
Entry.shortDescription: Number of consecutive times this watchpoint has evaluated to TRUE

Entry.name: CumulativeTrueCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total number of times this watchpoint has evaluated to TRUE

Entry.name: LastFalseToTrue
Entry.shortDescription: Last transition from FALSE to TRUE

Entry.name: LastTrueToFalse
Entry.shortDescription: Last transition from TRUE to FALSE

EnumeratedDataType.name: ArtActionResult
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Actionpoint Results Table (ART) ActionResult Enumerated Types

Entry.name: ActionResult
Entry.shortDescription: Result for the last sample of this actionpoint

Entry.name: CurrentState
Entry.shortDescription: Current state of this actionpoint

Entry.name: Padding
Entry.shortDescription: Structure padding

Entry.name: PassiveAPCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total number of times RTS not invoked because this AP was passive

Entry.name: FailToPassCount
Entry.shortDescription: How many times this actionpoint has transitioned from Fail to Pass

Entry.name: PassToFailCount
Entry.shortDescription: How many times this actionpoint has transitioned from Pass to Fail

Entry.name: ConsecutiveFailCount
Entry.shortDescription: Number of consecutive times this actionpoint has evaluated to Fail

Entry.name: CumulativeFailCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total number of times this actionpoint has evaluated to Fail

Entry.name: CumulativeRTSExecCount
Entry.shortDescription: Total number of times an RTS request has been sent for this actionpoint

Entry.name: CumulativeEventMsgsSent
Entry.shortDescription: Total number of event messages sent

EnumeratedDataType.name: AdtRPNOperator
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Actionpoint Definition Table (ADT) Reverse Polish Operators

EnumeratedDataType.name: WdtValErr
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Watchpoint Definition Table (WDT) Validation Error Enumerated Types

EnumeratedDataType.name: AdtValErr
EnumeratedDataType.shortDescription: Actionpoint Definition Table (WDT) Validation Error Enumerated Types
